long_description: A fast way to get your toddler onto the slopes, the Lucky Bums Falline T-Bar trainer lets you steer and control your child next to you and encourage correct body position from the very first run. Foam-padded tow bar rides just under the bum with handles for your child to hold on to as you take control of the steering and speed. Foam-padded stabilizing bar, handle and wrist loop put you in charge, while giving your little skier the feel of riding the slopes and learning correct posture. The durable steel T-Bar trainer helps develop core strength, leg strength, and balance at your child's own pace, with a helping hand from Mom or Dad.
short_description: A fast way to get your toddler onto the slopes, the Lucky Bums Falline T-Bar trainer lets you steer and control your child next to you and encourage correct body position from the very first run.
